title: Interactive 3D Portfolio
description: A modern portfolio website built with Next.js and React Three Fiber, featuring subtle 3D animations and portal transitions between sections.

title: AI Data Visualization Tool
description: An interactive web application for visualizing complex AI model outputs and training metrics in real-time 3D space.

title: Robotic Arm Web Controller
description: A web-based interface for controlling robotic arms with real-time 3D visualization and inverse kinematics simulation.
